Description
Application
 
CoreBankingService
This is a service class which is mocked for Core Banking service
CoreBankingStatementRequest
This class represents core banking statement generation request

This class represents the response from mocked core banking service
EmailService
This class is email service implemented to send email to user for notifications.
GenerateStatementRequest
This class holds the representation of statement generation request from client
GenerateStatementResponse
This class represents statement generation response to the client.

Response
This class represents generic response for all requests

This controller contains statement-request end point

This is a service class which generate statement.

StatementRequest
This is an entity class of database table STATEMENT_REQUEST
StatementRequestRecordRepository
This interface for all database operation
StatementRequestStatusCode
Status that can be used for statement request StatementRequestStatusCode.CREATED StatementRequestStatusCode.FAILED StatementRequestStatusCode.IN_PROGRESS StatementRequestStatusCode.COMPLETED
ThreadPoolExecutorConfig
This class contains configuration for executor pool
TransactionDetail
This class represents details of each transaction from the mocked core banking service
